#summary ADC - Analog to Digital Converter

= Introduction =

This page covers the ADC module.

= Missing functionality =

  * Bipolar input selection
  * Gain Select
  * High Speed selection ADHSM
  * ADNCDIS: ADC Noise Canceller Disable
  * ADSSEN: ADC Single Shot Enable on PSC’s synchronization signals
  * ADASCR: Analog to Digital Conversion on Amplified Channel Start Conversion Request Bit
  * AMISCR – Analog Miscellaneous Control Register

= Supported devices =

*Some devices require modification to the headers since avr-libc 1.7.0 still have errors in them.*
